com.datastax.oss.driver.api.core.cql

Interface BatchableStatement<SelfT extends BatchableStatement<SelfT>>

  • Type Parameters:
    SelfT - the "self type" used for covariant returns in subtypes.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Request, Statement<SelfT>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BoundStatement, SimpleStatement

    public interface BatchableStatement<SelfT extends BatchableStatement<SelfT>>
extends Statement<SelfT>
    A statement that can be added to a CQL batch.
